response.overview: WrestleMania 43, also promoted as WrestleMania Riyadh, is an upcoming 2027 professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming event produced by WWE. It will be the 43rd annual WrestleMania and will take place as a two-night event in 2027, in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and will be held for wrestlers from the promotion's Raw and SmackDown brand divisions.  This will be the first WrestleMania to be held outside of North America.
response.title: WrestleMania 43 - Sunday
